short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab extension for askSpoke.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are so excited to introduce askSpoke’s first browser extension. This extension works when opening up a new tab in Chrome. Once added and logged in with your askSpoke credentials, you’ll be able to:

• File a request
• View popular request types and file requests directly
• View popular resources

We look forward to you giving it a try! Your feedback is extremely valuable to us as we continue to build upon our V1 release. We’d love to hear what other functionalities you’d like to see in a browser extension.

To get access to the extension, simply install by clicking the “Add to Chrome” button above. You’ll be able to access it every time a new tab opens.
